subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Notre Dame coach isn’t sure if he should be proud or frustrated that his Irish team had to play all four of the N.C.A.A. tournament’s No. 1 seeds this season.
snippet: The Notre Dame coach isn’t sure if he should be proud or frustrated that his Irish team had to play all four of the N.C.A.A. tournament’s No. 1 seeds this season.
